last_episode_to_air.name: Smoked Salmon
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jamie makes smoked salmon accompanied by potato salad, beets and cottage cheese, rye bread and homemade butter.

name: Jamie's 30-Minute Meals
overview: Jamie's 30-Minute Meals is a series of 40 episodes aired in 2010 on Channel 4 in which Jamie Oliver cooks a three- to four-dish meal in under 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Piri Piri Chicken
episodes.overview: This time Jamie's cooking piri piri chicken with dressed potatoes, rocket salad and quick Portuguese tarts.

episodes.name: Thai Red Prawn Curry
episodes.overview: Jamie cooked a tasty Thai dinner with papaya platter as one of his 30 Minute Meals.

episodes.name: Roast Beef
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver shows how to make roast beef with baby Yorkshire puddings, little carrots, crispy potatoes and gravy in half an hour.

episodes.name: Spinach and Feta
episodes.overview: Jamie shows how to make spinach and feta filo pie, cucumber salad, tomato salad, and coated ice cream in just thirty minutes.

episodes.name: Jools's Pasta
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver prepares 'Pregnant Jools's Pasta' with crunchy chicory and watercress salad, and little frangipane tarts.

episodes.name: Rogan Josh Curry
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver presents a step-by-step guide to making a rogan josh curry with rice, carrot salad, poppadoms and flatbread.

episodes.name: Duck Salad
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares a duck salad with giant croutons and demonstrates an easy recipe for rice pudding with stewed fruit.

episodes.name: Oozy Mushroom Risotto
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver shows how to cook oozy mushroom risotto with spinach salad, and quick lemon and raspberry cheesecake, all in 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Steak Sarnie
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver presents another real-time cookery demonstration, preparing a steak sandwich with crispy new potatoes, cheesy mushrooms and beetroot salad.

episodes.name: Chicken Pie
episodes.overview: Chef Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to cook a chicken pie with French-style peas and sweet carrot mash, before preparing berries with shortbread and Chantilly cream.

episodes.name: Fish Tray Bake
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver presents a step-by-step guide to making a fish tray bake with Jersey Royal potatoes, salsa verde and a simple spinach salad, followed by banoffee pie.

episodes.name: Cauliflower Macaroni
episodes.overview: The chef makes cauliflower macaroni, and prepares a chicory salad with a unique dressing, followed by stewed fruit.

episodes.name: Stuffed Focaccia
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver shows how to prepare focaccia stuffed with prosciutto and celeriac remoulade, served with dressed mozzarella and fresh lemon and lime granita, all in half an hour.

episodes.name: Moroccan Lamb
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver shows how to make Moroccan lamb chops, served with flatbreads, herby couscous, stuffed peppers and pomegranate - all in half an hour.

episodes.name: Sea Bass and Crispy Pancetta
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares sea bass and crispy pancetta with sweet potato and asian greens, berry ice-cream and sparkling lemon ginger drink.

episodes.name: Summer Veg Lasagne
episodes.overview: Jamie makes summer veg lasagne, Tuscan tomato salad and quick mango frozen yoghurt in baby cornets - all in under half an hour.

episodes.name: Smoky Haddock Corn Chowder
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares smoky haddock corn chowder, spiced tiger prawns, rainbow salad and raspberry and elderflower slushie.

episodes.name: Kinda Sausage Cassoulet
episodes.overview: Jamie shows how to cook kinda sausage cassoulet, warm broccoli salad and berry and custard pie in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Asian Style Salmon
episodes.overview: Jamie shows how to make Asian-style salmon, noodle broth, beanspout salad and lychee desert in under half an hour.

episodes.name: Killer Jerk Chicken
episodes.overview: Chef Jamie Oliver presents a step-by-step guide to preparing jerk chicken with rice and beans, chopped salad and chargrilled corn. Last in the series.

episodes.name: Rib Eye Stir Fry
episodes.overview: Jamie creates a rib eye steak stir fry with dan dan noodles and chilled hibiscus tea in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Thai Green Curry
episodes.overview: Jamie creates a Thai green curry with crispy chicken, kimchee slaw and rice noodles in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Spaghetti
episodes.overview: Jamie creates a spaghetti alla puttanesca with crunchy salad, garlic bread, and silky chocolate ganache in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Tapas Feast
episodes.overview: Jamie creates a tapas feast of tortilla, glazed chorizo, manchego cheese, cured meats and honey, stuffed peppers and rolled anchovies in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Super-Fast Beef Hash
episodes.overview: Jamie creates a beef hash with jacket potatoes, goddess salad and lovely butter beans and bacon in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Spring Lamb
episodes.overview: Jamie creates spring lamb with vegetable platter, mint sauce, chianti gravy and chocolate fondue in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Mustard Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie creates mustard chicken with quick dauphinoise potatoes, greens, and black forest affogato in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Trapani-Style Rigatoni
episodes.overview: Jamie creates Trapani-style rigatoni with griddled chicory salad, rocket and parmesan salad, and limoncello kinda trifle in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Sticky Pan-Fried Scallops
episodes.overview: Jamie creates sticky pan-fried scallops with sweet chilli rice, dressed greens and quick brownies in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Cheat's Pizza
episodes.overview: Jamie creates cheat's pizza, three delish salads, and squashed cherries and vanilla mascarpone cream in just 30 minutes.

episodes.name: Crispy Salmon
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares crispy salmon with jazzed-up rice, a salad of baby courgette, gorgeous guacamole and berry spritzer.

episodes.name: Wonky Summer Pasta
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares a delicious feast of wonky summer pasta, herby salad, and drop pear tartlets.

episodes.name: Stuffed Cypriot Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie makes stuffed Cypriot chicken with pan-fried asparagus and vine tomatoes, cabbage salad, and St Clement's and vanilla ice-cream float.

episodes.name: British Picnic
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares a classic British picnic, including sausage rolls, mackerel pâté, lovely asparagus, crunchy salad, and Pimm's Eton mess.

episodes.name: Sardines
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks grilled sardines with crispy halloumi, watercress salad and figs, followed by a thick chocolate mousse.

episodes.name: Steak Indian-Style
episodes.overview: Jamie prepares steak Indian-style with spinach and paneer salad, naan breads and a mango dessert.

episodes.name: Tasty Crusted Cod
episodes.overview: Tasty crusted cod with "my mashy peas," tartare sauce and warm garden salad all feature on Jamie's menu today.

episodes.name: Chicken Skewers
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks chicken skewers with amazing satay sauce which he serves with a fiery noodle salad, followed by fruit and mint sugar.

episodes.name: Broccoli Orecchiette
episodes.overview: Jamie knocks up broccoli orecchiette with courgette and bocconcini salad, plus prosciutto and melon salad.

episodes.name: Smoked Salmon
episodes.overview: Jamie makes smoked salmon accompanied by potato salad, beets and cottage cheese, rye bread and homemade butter.
